value.title: Dataflows and power query - November 2020 update
value.excerpt: Have you seen the new and upcoming features released on November 2020 for Dataflows and Power Query? In today's video, I will go through them so you stay up to date:  00:00 Intro 00:24 New Diagram view 01:36 New schema view 02:16 Add column from example  02:20 Add web from example 03:13 Fuzzy grouping

value.title: DAX Fridays! #105: ISINSCOPE
value.excerpt: The DAX function ISINSCOPE, allow us to work with hierarchies in Power BI. In this video I will go through an example on how to do that. This DAX function was introduced in the November 2018 Power BI Desktop Update, so make sure you have that installed if you wan to test it out.  Other resources:  DAX

value.title: DAX Fridays! #106: Power Query or DAX?
value.excerpt: If you already know, how about you share your thoughts here? If not, then I will share my thoughts in the topic.  There are no perfect answers, only good questions ;)  Happy Friday!  Get Northwind Dataset: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k3NMIlLffrU  Link to DAX Fridays survey: http://bit.ly/2MMM4KK

value.title: DAX Fridays! #116: Time intelligence with Fiscal Years

value.title: DAX Fridays! #124: Weekly time intelligence in Power BI

value.title: DAX Fridays! #167: Calculate previous row using DAX

value.title: DAX Fridays! #179: Use a slicer to highlight values instead of filter them in Power BI 😎
value.excerpt: Did you know that you can use a slicer in Power BI to highlight values instead of filtering them?  Let me show you the technique here, but if you are up for it, give it a go before and let us know what you came up to!  Pass multiple values from a slicer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_k_Qxb6pyCc  iscrossfilter

Enjoy!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center
